SELECT t1.loc_group_no,t1.loc_group_name,t1.area_no, t1.pred_transfer_type_no,t1.succ_transfer_type_no,t1.curr_transfer_type_no, t1.pred_transfer_no,t1.succ_transfer_no,t1.curr_transfer_no, t1.loc_count,t2.area_name, t3.transfer_type_name AS pred_transfer_type_name,t4.transfer_type_name AS succ_transfer_type_name,t5.transfer_type_name AS curr_transfer_type_name FROM PSB_LOC_GROUP T1 LEFT JOIN psb_area t2 ON t1.area_no = t2.area_no LEFT JOIN psb_transfer_type t3 ON t1.pred_transfer_type_no = t3.transfer_type_no LEFT JOIN psb_transfer_type t4 ON t1.succ_transfer_type_no = t4.transfer_type_no LEFT JOIN psb_transfer_type t5 ON t1.curr_transfer_type_no = t5.transfer_type_no
T1.LOC_GROUP_NO LIKE '%'||#where.LOC_GROUP_NO#||'%'
T1.LOC_GROUP_NAME LIKE '%'||#where.LOC_GROUP_NAME#||'%'
T1.AREA_NO = #where.AREA_NO#
ORDER BY LOC_GROUP_NO
select t1.area_no sskey,t1.area_name ssValue from PSB_AREA T1 ORDER BY t1.area_no
